Detailed Description

Represents a drawable object containing a text which is automatically wrapped on whitespaces to fit into the given boundaries of the drawable object. The text may have its own textformat and color.

const WCHAR *  text = 0,
const TextFormat &  text_format = TextFormat(),
BOOLEAN  vertical_centered = FALSE
) 
 

Parameters:
control Pointer to parent control, which includes the text box as child.
text Text content.
text_format Format of the text content.
vertical_centered If set to TRUE, the text will be vertically centered. If FALSE is used, the text is aligned on the top border of the text box.

Component::IsInstanceOf

Reimplemented from AbstractTextObject.

BOOLEAN TextBox::IsVerticalCentered (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE, if the text will be vertically centered. Per default FALSE is returned, which means that the text is aligned on the top border of the text box.

BOOLEAN TextBox::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from AbstractTextObject.

void TextBox::SetVerticalCentered (  BOOLEAN  vertical_centered  ) 
 

If set to TRUE, the text will be vertically centered. If FALSE is used, the text is aligned on the top border of the text box.
